Texts.Eng: ... I don't know how I should feel about keeping some of those.
Texts.Chs: ... 我不知道我该怎么想保留一些。

Texts.Eng: Chickens are compliant enough if you ain't a jerk around 'em. Make 'em angry though...
Texts.Chs: 如果你不是一个混蛋的话，小鸡们是很顺从的。但是让他们生气。。。

Texts.Eng: Chickens can be surprisingly good companions, if raised tenderly.
Texts.Chs: 如果饲养得当，鸡可以成为令人惊讶的好伴侣。

Texts.Eng: Chickens much easier to hunt than birdman. But sssometimes Floran just pets instead.
Texts.Chs: 鸡比鸟人更容易捕猎。但有时叶族人只是宠物。

Texts.Eng: Chickens: A stable source of eggs, legs, and, if you're foolish enough - unmatched revenge squads.
Texts.Chs: 鸡：蛋、腿的稳定来源，如果你够傻的话，还有无与伦比的复仇小队。

Texts.Eng: Glad to see the chicken has continued to find uses beyond the stars.
Texts.Chs: 很高兴看到小鸡继续在星星之外寻找用途。

Texts.Eng: Hylotl rarely keep these as livestock. Instead, breeders raise their chickens too show of colorful plumage on the showfloor.
Texts.Chs: 鲛人很少将这些作为牲畜饲养。取而代之的是，饲养者在展台上饲养的鸡也会展现出五颜六色的羽毛。
